body: This is the worst thing I’ve ever seen, Jesus Christ! What the actual fuck is this shit.

@Lolisniffer I'm certain that there are many people on this site who have been influenced by the fictional stories they've read over the years, to say nothing of the doujins that they've read. The only thing is these impressions left in the minds of people are often innocuous, or sometimes beneficial. But, that doesn't mean that some person can't read this doujin, or others like it, and have something affirmed in their minds, causing them to act on some though or predilection that would've been better left untouched.

@Lolisniffer Moreover, your reasoning of such works being okay simply because they are fictional and, thus, can't have an impact on the real-world is flawed.

I'm not one of those individuals who starts frothing at the mouth with "righteous indignation" over a doujin. But, to state that a fictional work can't have any bearing on the real world, or even the sometimes impressionable and highly susceptible people within it, is false. The human mind (psyche) is incredibly complex and sensitive. All it takes is one misalignment, one pervasive idea or concept, to irrevocably alter how an individual thinks and feels.
